testsuite.name: dungeonmania.mvp.MercenaryTest

testcase.name: Test mercenaries can not move through closed doors
Testing a mercenary can be bribed with a certain amount
Test mercenary stops if they cannot move any closer to the player
Testing a mercenary can be bribed within a radius
Test mercenary moves around a wall to get to the player
Test mercenary in line with Player moves towards them
Testing an allied mercenary does not battle the player
